name: Conflict
description: The Gate of Friction - The power of emotional and physical intimacy through friction

channel.name: Mating
channel.description: The Channel of Mating - A Design Focused on Reproduction

signal.script: Friction creates intimacy when navigated consciously. What needs to be spoken that hasn't been?
experiments: Have the difficult conversation with compassion
Express your emotional truth without blame
Ask: 'What is this conflict trying to create?'

friction.trigger: Avoiding conflict at cost of intimacy
friction.script: Your peace-keeping is creating distance. Real intimacy includes navigating discord together. Where have you sacrificed truth for harmony?
experiments: Practice small acts of healthy disagreement

breakpoint.trigger: Relationship crisis or deep emotional pain
breakpoint.script: This intensity is transformation in motion. You're not breaking—you're breaking through to a new level of relating.
experiments: Seek support from a therapist or trusted guide
Write unsent letters to process emotion
